titleStmt.title: The divine wooer, or, A poem setting forth the love and loveliness of the Lord Jesus and his great desire of our welfare and happiness, and propounding many arguments ... to persuade souls to the faith and obedience of him ... / composed by J.H.
titleStmt.author: Horn, John, 1614-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Taylor and T. Sawbridge,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
